name: quartet
content:
quartet noun
(GROUP)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C, + sing/pl verb ] a group of four people who play musical instruments or sing as a group: A string quartet was playing Mozart.
DreamPictures/Photolibrary/GettyImages

quartet noun
(PIECE OF MUSIC)
[ C ] a piece of music written for four people: He has composed 18 quartets and 14 symphonies.

four people who sing or play musical instruments together, or a piece of music written for four people: A string quartet was playing Mozart.
